title: question about weird things some champions say in game
body:
now i dont read lore so maybe im missing something but...

so apparently {{champion:142}} doesnt know what water is? despite being from runeterra originally...i think she refers to it as "ankle deep liquid" if i remember correctly why doesnt she know what water is? despite being an aspect from runeterra, surely shes seen water on other planets/dimensions, but she knows what donuts are? what? 

{{champion:10}} doesnt know what yordles are? despite being half aspect? id assume her having god like powers shed know of the existence of an intelligent species that lives along side humans. 

{{champion:161}} supposed to be an super intelligent creature....doesn't know basic human biology..doesnt know why we cry and cant tell the difference between male and female except by the pitch of their cries..?


{{champion:518}} barely knows English yet says "hola" even though so far we havent seen a single Hispanic champion or know of anyone in runeterra that speaks Spanish. 


{{champion:266}} not just him but a lot of champions are racist against yordles for some reason...why? 
{{champion:81}} "yordles...whyd it have to be yordles?"

{{champion:427}} use to be human and doesn't  know what shoes are... "hey! its those thingys.......that........people wear..thank you.."


{{champion:19}} is a good guy???  "cant save them all, dont want too." i think he has a few more lines that refers to him saving people but i cant think of them


thats all i can think of for now, have you guys noticed anything weird champions have said that dont make sense?
